pages.text: The $(mob)Werecat$() is a monster that spawns in Forests of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It attacks players on sight by closing the distance with a leaping attack with strong knockback before following up with rapid melee attacks which inflict $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() on hit. When reduced to 25% health or lower, a $(mob)Werecat$() may flee combat entirely.
$(mob)Werecats$() drop $(item)Meat$() on death, which serves as a decent source of food.

$(mob)Werecats$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
